column4: Guys.....need help..i install ubuntu 7.04 andeverything worked fine....i went to symantic manager and installed some of the ALSA components.....i restarted the system and now i cant play any songs or music...it says it has problem either with some gstreamer plugins or detecting audio device.i installed all gstreamer drivers...wht shall i do
I recommend getting Armok from package manager, it's a good music player
is ubuntu able to make any sort of sound at all?
